ComicInfo.Series: Night of the Living Dead: Aftermath
ComicInfo.Summary:
DAVID HINE continues his fast paced zombie nightmare by expanding the Night of the Living Dead mythology into a new decade. The world has lived with the threat of the undead for years, but what happens when all the assurances of containment are revealed to be lies? How does the world handle the potential destruction of civilization at the clawed hands of a ghoul epidemic? Get your chomp on here with the original zombie vision and see the world through the eyes of the condemned.
Available with Regular cover by Matt Busch, Gore and Wraparound covers by Matt Martin, and Terror Retailer Incentive cover also by Busch.
